duties_responsibilities.duty: Performs all duties related to dishwashing and maintaining general cleanliness of the kitchen area.
Assists with kitchen deliveries including proper storage, organization, and rotation of products.
Provides excellent customer service, addresses needs of customers in a timely and effective manner.
Ensures compliance with established procedures including health and sanitation and safe work practices.
Maintains a clean and sanitary working and shopping environment.
Performs opening, mid, and closing duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: No specific education or certification required.
